item.title: React - Ideal Directory Structure
item.description: Directory structures like the example below are very frustrating when working with or moving towards a modular front-end. As a front-end developer, I’ve been creating React components for little over two years (from the date of this post), in this time I’m adamant we need to evolve structures like this. Example of a traditional directory structure: - dist - src - main - web - pages - containers - scripts - templates - styles - tests .
